text: “Yemwe adali ndi maphunziro (akuya) a m’buku adati: “Ine ndikubweletsera (chimpandocho) maso ako asadaphetire (usadatsinzine ndi kupenya).” Pamene adachiona chitakhazikitsidwa patsogolo pake, adati: “Izi nchifukwa cha ufulu wa Mbuye wanga kuti andiyese mayeso kodi ndithokoza kapena ndiusuliza (ufulu Wake). Ndipo amene akuthokoza ndithu ubwino wa kuthokozako udzakhala pa iye mwini. Ndipo amene akukana (mtendere wa Allah posathokoza), ndithu Mbuye wanga Ngokhupuka; Waulemu, (sasaukira chilichonse kwa anthu).”
